column4: hi, i tried to install mandriva(kde) on my desktop, and after i booted up i cant use my mouse, anyone know how i can fix this problem....i came in here cause i thought maybe someone could help, no one responding to me in #mandriva
this is the ubuntu channel not the mandriva one
i just said no one responding in mandriva
still a problem for the #mandriva ppl ,  go back to their channel and be patient
